channel.title: Message to all on a timer
channel.description: Alright, I want my forums to be sent as a message to all about every 2 minuets. How would I go about making this code, and where do I add it?

item.title: Message to all on a timer
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:

Well I knew that, but what would it be like

actionTimer = "something"[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2008, 04:27:20 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know!?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2008, 05:43:24 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know?
